results.title: Insights from yeast: Transcriptional reprogramming following metformin treatment is similar to that of deferiprone in a yeast Friedreich's ataxia model.
results.text_hl: Insights from @SPECIES_4932 @@@yeast@@@: Transcriptional reprogramming following @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment is similar to that of @CHEMICAL_Deferiprone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077543 @@@deferiprone@@@ in a @SPECIES_4932 @@@yeast@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Friedreich_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005621 @@@Friedreich's ataxia@@@ model.
